question: What if I have specific directions for how I need my laundry to be done?
answer: We understand that everyone has their laundry preferences. Whether you need certain items air-dried or delicate fabrics washed in cold water, we've got you covered. Simply provide detailed instructions when you place your order, and we'll make sure your laundry is handled exactly as you desire.

question: I have a lot of laundry - is that okay?
answer: Absolutely! Our standard subscription handles up to 20 lbs per pickup (2x / month) , and our family plan goes up to 40 lbs per pickup (4x/month). If you've got more laundry than that, no worries- you can add as much as you need for just $2 per pound. Not sure how much your laundry weighs? We'll weigh it for you while we complete your order.

question: How soon will my laundry will be done once it's picked up?
answer: At NoScrubs, we start working on your laundry as soon as we get it. Your laundry will typically be done within about 4 hours after pickup. The time may vary depending on the size of your laundry load and the time of the day. However, rest assured you will receive clean, folded laundry as quickly as possible.

question: How do I schedule my first pickup?
answer: To schedule your first pickup, start by subscribing to NoScrubs through our website or app. After subscribing, you'll gain access to our scheduling calendar. Simply select a time that fits your schedule, and you're all set. You can leave your laundry by the door for our team to pick up or hand it over directly.

question: What kind of detergent do you use?
answer: At NoScrubs, we use a hypoallergenic, dye-free, unscented detergent to ensure your clothes are cleaned gently. Our detergents are safe for sensitive skin. If you prefer a specific detergent, feel free to provide it along with your laundry, and we'll use your preferred product instead.

question: I have some questions not listed here. How can I get an answer?
answer: If you have any questions not covered here, please call or text us at (737) 321-7722. You can also send us an email to support@noscrubs.io. Our team is ready to help and will reach out to you promptly to provide the answers you need.

question: Does NoScrubs offer any quality or damage guarantees?
answer: Yes, NoScrubs Laundry Service offers two guarantees for a stress-free laundry experience. 1. Satisfaction Guarantee: If your clothes don't come back to your complete satisfaction, let us know, and we'll refund the cost of your order. 2. Damage Insurance: If any clothing damage occurs, your order is insured for verified claims up to $750 at no additional cost. Our laundry experts take great care with every load, so issues are rare, but we're here to ensure your clothes are fully protected.
